channel.title: Deleted Minecraft House
channel.description:
Well, I just upgraded my Minecraft. To do so, I needed to delete the Minecraft folder. I did so and emptied my trash; then I downloaded Minecraft again. Minecraft 1.8.1 looks great!
Then...I realized I had deleted my single player maps! I had a program try to recover that deleted file, but it was of no avail. I lost my home world that I spent hours on :/
So if you were in a situation like this, what would you recommend to build in your next home/home world?

item.title: Deleted Minecraft House
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Demon6994:

1.8.1… ADVENTURE MODE. Unlimited items to make a house. (:

Its the adventure UPDATE, not adventure mode. How do people not know this by now?

Read full topic

A man cave until I had enough materials to make an awesome castle.
